effect.short: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavorTexts.text:
On the second turn, the user hits the target with
electrically charged ice. This may also leave the
target with paralysis.
